Description:
A Spacious Family Home in a Top Location!
Absolutely enticing to all, this Porter Davis built family home is completed from front to back leaving nothing to do but to move in and enjoy. Behind the striking facade awaits a superb selection of formal and informal living zones, highlighted by open-plan casual living/meals area overlooking beautiful gardens.
Features 4 living areas including study/5th bedroom, a comfortable main bedroom retreat with ensuite and walk -in wardrobe, a 2nd,3rd and a further 4th bedroom well serviced by a light filled central bathroom. Further features include; well appointed kitchen with stone benches, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, down-lights throughout and double garage.
Located in one of Derrimut's most coveted locations, this outstanding residence is only 20 minutes to the CBD and has every modern day requirement at your disposal.
AUCTION SATURDAY 19TH SEPTEMBER AT 2:30PM
Contact Gioan Pham 0422 804 082

Description:
Your Dream Home Awaits
This absolute gem is awaiting the homeowner who wants it all. Showcasing impeccable workmanship alongside modern family luxury living overlooking parklands, close to schools, transport, ring road and freeeway access.
Boasting a superb floor plan comprising of 3 lavish bedrooms, 2 stunning bathrooms as well a generous ensemble of living rooms.
Upon entering, guests are greeted by an impressive entry with soaring high ceilings. A decadent master suite complete with walk-in robes, large en suite and retreat which enables you to immerse yourself in absolute seclusion and serenity.
The property also comprises a generous study, dining area, casual living room and Theatre Room. The gourmet kitchen includes top quality stainless steel appliances, caesarstone bench tops and splashback.
For leisure, the astounding property offers an exciting variety of indoor and outdoor options. It comprises of a massive alfresco area with outdoor Spa.
To further ensure a lifestyle of effortless peace and comfort, convenience and pleasure, the property also provides secure garaging for 2 cars heating/cooling and established landscaping.

Description:
64 SQUARE HOME SET ON 1000 m2 BLOCK( APPROX)
A fantastic opportunity to secure a magnificent architectural designed home situated in a great sought after location. Within short walking distance to all amenities including: recreational facilities, parklands, public transport, shops, local schools and much more. This beautifully proportioned home offers a stunning wide entrance and an abundance of features with lots of space for all the family to relax. Bedroom accommodation is generous with luxurious main en-suite with spa and double vanities, the other three bedrooms consisting of WIRs, also adding large family retreat area where you would enjoy the most beautiful view from the balcony. Downstairs offers a powder room with shower, large laundry and a huge study area. Spacious family living areas, open plan meals area adjoining spacious modern kitchen boasting stainless steel appliances and granite bench top, also a second fully equipped kitchen. The further massive entertainment room ideal to gather family or friends together on a special occasion. With other highlights including hydronic heating throughout, refrigerated zone cooling, ducted vacuum, beautiful light fittings, alarm system, granite stone in all bathrooms and much more. Set on 1000 Sqm( approx) of land, this 64 square home also features a larger than usual double garage with rear roller door and internal access suitable for trailer or boat with extra parking for up to 5 cars for visitors, with this there are two separate driveways and entry's to the garage. This is the best pocket of Derrimut surrounded with quality neighbours.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
MODERN & ELEGANT ENTERTAINERS HOME
Set amongst other quality homes is this perfectly finished entertainers home offering a private quality lifestyle designed for indoor / outdoor living.
This modern ex-display home offers sleek and stylish open plan living, 3 well-appointed bedrooms all with built in robes and master offering walk through robe to ensuite. Timber decked alfresco area situated to the rear of the property opening off the living zone, double garage with internal assess and surrounded by fully landscaped gardens.
Positioned close to schools, public transport, a moments' drive to local shops and a stone's throw away from freeway access. With what this property has to offer, this makes the perfect purchase for first or second home buyers or even the astute investor alike.

Description:
31 Squares of Luxury!
Luxury on a large scale (31 squares approx.), an abundance of natural light, and a convenient park-side location, this exceptional contemporary residence ticks all the most important boxes, and does so with a distinctive designer edge.
A remarkable sense of space is immediately established by domains that make the utmost of an intelligent floor plan, complemented by a gorgeous alfresco and a kitchen defined by stone surfaces, stainless steel appliances, integrated storage and butler's pantry.
The flexible floor plan delivers four spacious bedrooms fitted with built in robes, master completed by full ensuite and superbly appointed outdoor courtyard, while a huge rumpus and study nook reflects the cleverness of the design.
High ceilings, square set cornices, three toilets, ducted heating, split system cooling, internally accessed double garage with built in storage further underlines the vast appeal of this family home.
A convenient location matches the compelling style of this stunning home, surrounded by the best of what Derrimut has to offer.
Contact Gioan Pham 0422 804 082

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & STEVE JUSUP
Right in the heart of the action, literally steps from all the suburbs amenities sits this stylish and sophisticated abode. Beautifully maintained and presented, the home boasts 3 spacious bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite and a lovely open plan kitchen that overlooks the expansive dining and living space that spills out to the alfresco area and low maintenance rear gardens. Completing the home is a high quality central bathroom, large laundry with direct access to outside and double remote garage with internal access and bonus rear roller door. Additional upgrades and luxuries include high ceilings, ducted heating, cooling, alarm, stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances in kitchen, downlights and landscaped gardens. The perfect entry level opportunity for first home buyers and downsizers or a shrewd purchase for savvy investors awaits.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
With great street appeal, and a flexible floorplan allowing the design to be easily converted into a 4 bedroom plus study home accommodating any buyers particular requirements, this lovely Porter Davis residence promises to be popular. The property currently comprises 3 spacious bedrooms with BIRs, the master with WIR and double vanity ensuite with oversize shower. The contemporary open plan design features extra thick Caesar stone benchtop kitchen with stainless steel appliances overlooking the large dining and living space which leads out to the lovely decked alfresco area and gardens creating a great indoor/outdoor entertainment zone. Other features include separate study( 4th bedroom conversion), second living or rumpus room, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings, landscaped low maintenance front and rear gardens and double remote garage with internal access. All this on a large allotment of 512sqm.

AUCTION THIS SATURDAY AT 12PM
Exceptional emphasis on modern design, contemporary style and family functionality, this stunning home will certainly impress boasting a desirable address minutes to Derrimut Village Shopping Centre, schools, transport, easy freeway access and more.
Light filled open spaces are enhanced by beautiful floors boards throughout, sublime open kitchen, dining and family room opening out to a low maintenance rear yard, perfect for entertaining. Inviting a tremendous easy living lifestyle, this family home is sure to impress upon inspection.
Auction Saturday 1st August at 12pm

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU!!!
Once in a while the ultimate in family living comes on the market. Luxurious in every sense this young, masterfully crafted home exudes quality and upgrades that will make you the envy of family and friends. The three cleverly designed living zones create the much sought after requirements of modern living. Upstairs the sizable retreat creates a fourth living zone that leads to the master bedroom with balcony and is a sanctuary in itself; the sensational ensuite has a double shower, huge vanity and spa, his and hers WIRs. Downstairs the expansive, flowing floor plan begins with a large open study and formal lounge room which takes you to the exquisite kitchen with its quality appliances, stone bench tops, soft closing cabinetry and WIP; the theatre room, family and dining areas (which leads out to the alfresco) round out this impressive living zone. Other notable features include ducted heating system, spilt system air-conditioners x 3, evaporative cooling system (both upstairs and downstairs), zoned alarm system, extra-large garage with internal and rear drive through access.
Insights: 18 Hardwick Crescent, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2015.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
You are on a winner with this quality built Porter Davis home that is further complimented by its great sized rear yard with possible side access and prized Derrimut location only metres from all the suburbs amenities. Sleeping quarters comprise 3 spacious bedrooms - master with WIR, oversize shower with double vanity ensuite and 2 additional bedrooms with BIRs serviced by a central bathroom. Completing the home is a separate lounge ( possible 4th Bedroom conversion) and at the rear of the property, an open plan kitchen / dining / living area with its northerly aspect providing plenty of natural light that spills out into the fantastic rear space featuring large entertainment deck, vast grassed area for the kids to play and soothing water feature. Other features include high ceilings, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, solar panel system, stone benches in kitchen, downlights, natural skylight in main bathroom, beautifully landscaped gardens and double remote garage. A lovely family home awaits one lucky purchaser.

Description:
Modern, Safe and Secure!
This nicely constructed home has all the features to make you feel comfortable, safe and secure. Consisting of 3 bedrooms, master with Ensuite and WIR and two spacious living areas. An open plan modern kitchen with SS European appliances incorporates breakfast bar, new Caesar stone bench top throughout property, electronically controlled roller shutters, remote control double garage.
The whole property is created with comfort in mind incorporating fully concreted low maintenance yard, central heating and split system inverter Air-conditioning. Close to Derrimut and Brimbank Shopping Centres, schools, restaurants and cafes and within easy access to freeway. This house is the perfect place to call home.

Description:
Picture Perfect Family Abode
Positioned in one of the most tranquil pockets of Derrimut this 4 bedroom north facing residence is the perfect family home. Upon entry be amazed with the impressive floor plan of this magnificent property. Offering 4 generous sized bedrooms with BIR's & master with WIR and ensuite. Walk down the hall and enjoy the large formal lounge before open up to your large entertainers open plan kitchen meals and living area fully equipped with stone bench tops & SS Appliances. Further features include ducted heating, cooling, high ceilings, down lights throughout, and much more. Not only is it a magnificent modern day property but just have a look at the location. Within close proximity to schools, public transport, parkland's ,Derrimut village shopping centre & easy access to freeways.
Auction Time 11th of July 1:00pm
Edward Herdegen 0401 946 597
